name: CategoryTheory.Conv.one_eq
initialProofState:
C : Type u₁
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v₁, u₁} C
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategory C
M : Comon_ C
N : Mon_ C
⊢ Eq 1 (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp M.counit N.one)
decl: theorem one_eq : (1 : Conv M N) = M.counit ≫ N.one := rfl

name: CategoryTheory.Conv.mul_eq
initialProofState:
C : Type u₁
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v₁, u₁} C
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategory C
M : Comon_ C
N : Mon_ C
f g : CategoryTheory.Conv M N
⊢ Eq (HMul.hMul f g) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp M.comul (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.whiskerRight f M.X) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.whiskerLeft N.X g) N.mul)))
decl: theorem mul_eq (f g : Conv M N) : f * g = M.comul ≫ f ▷ M.X ≫ N.X ◁ g ≫ N.mul := rfl
